title: (Album-Oldies) B.B. King & Friends - Night of Blistering Blues 1
description:
HELLO
MY REGULAR TORRENT TRACKER IS CLOSED DOWN.

I AM NOW RESEEDING MY OLDIES ON THIS SITE
LOOK FOR MY OLDIES. ALL OF THEM ARE COMPLETELY REMASTERED AND SOUND GREAT!

ENJOY

12 tracks in playlist, average track length: 5:36
Estimated playlist length: 1 hour 7 minutes 15 seconds 


Playlist files:

03. B.B. King, Eric Clapton, Phil Collins - Thrill Is Gone (7:00)
04. B.B. King, Dr. John, Etta James - I&#039;d Rather Go Blind (6:04)

07. B.B. King, Etta James - Something&#039;s Got a Hold on Me (3:53)
08. B.B. King, Paul Butterfield, Etta James, Chaka Khan, Gladys Knight, Billy Ocean, Stevie Ray Vaughan - In the Midnight Hour - Night of Blistering Blues
09. B.B. King, Etta James, Chaka Khan, Gladys Knight - Ain&#039;t Nobody&#039;s Business - Night of Blistering Blues

This is a Big Part of your B.B. Collection
These ReMasters turned out great.
Enjoy!

NOTE:
TURN OFF ALL BASS, TREBLE & EQ BEFORE YOU PLAY THESE SONGS.
